scenario_text.value:
(Hm? That’s odd. It’s like I can feel this
strange presence all of a sudden...)
...will not be!
Huh?!

This will not be... Even now, you would seek
to thwart my ambition?
Miyuki!
Of course.

Much time has passed in the human world since
our arrival in this one.

Any you would have sought revenge on, Master
Haruchika, have long since passed away.
Please, will you not set aside your rage?
It’s you!

No matter how much time goes by, I can never
forget what was done to me.

(That’s not Miyuki talking. It’s the mind of
the Master, Haruchika, that’s in control.)
(He’s speaking through Miyuki!)

I will take revenge for what my sister, what
my clan did to me!

They will pay for abandoning me! Feel my
wrath at being cast aside!
Urgh... Ugh...

No! You’ve got it...all wrong! It wasn’t...
like that!

Your rage has been...misplaced... *pant*
*pant* Please...listen to me!
No! I tell you, it will not be!

You would resist me, Miyuki? Damned
descendant of that vile brood! If so...
Oooooohhhhhh!!!
I will consume you!!!

No! If you do that, Miyuki will join the
Kenzoku!
We have to stop him! Let’s go!
